examples: The economy has shown significant improvement over the past 9 months.
La economía ha mostrado una mejora significativa durante los últimos 9 meses.
We expect to see further improvement over the coming year.
Esperamos ver una mejora adicional durante el próximo año.
Sales figures continue to show signs of improvement.
Las cifras de ventas continúan mostrando signos de mejora.
There were areas that needed improvement.
